text: Soshite kare-ra wa, shinja-tachi ni au to,`watashi-tachi wa shinjiru.' To iu. Daga otagai dake de au to, kare-ra wa iu. `Arra ga anata gata ni kaimei sa reta mono o, taitai kare-ra (musurimu) ni shirasete yari,-nushi no gozen de, kare-ra ga sore ni tsuite anata gata o tokifuseru (yochi o) ataeru no ka.' Anata gata wa (kare-ra no nerai ga) wakaranai no ka
